channel.title: Hero Arts on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in Hero Arts on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Freshly Made Sketches #552*
item.description: I got home from work yesterday and sat down in my creative space, hoping to make a card. I saw the latest sketch at Freshly Made Sketches and decided to try my hand at it… I really hope my mojo shows up on the rest of my days off this week… Card Info Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Basic Black Paper: MFT Party Time Images: Pink Fresh Studios Happy Birthday Sentiments Ink: Versafine Clair Nocturne

item.title: *CAS on Friday #238*
item.description: I found a little time earlier this week to play along with the current TAG challenge at CAS on Friday. I have had this idea in my head for a bit and finally put it together for this card. I wanted to do it with just the tag on the card front to keep it more CAS but it just didn’t look right… I had this piece of embossed cardstock on my desk, the leftovers from a previous creation, so I tried it and loved it!
